sys_ux_client_script.name: setStatesForSingleRecordEdit
sys_ux_client_script.script: /** * @param {params} params * @param {api} params.api * @param {any} params.event * @param {any} params.imports * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers */ function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) { api.setState("parkingLocation", api.data.get_single_parking.result.location.value) api.setState("parkingStatus", api.data.get_single_parking.result.active.value) api.setState("parkingPlaces", api.data.get_single_parking.result.parking_places.value) api.setState("parkingName", api.data.get_single_parking.result.name.value) }
